page.title: 11Life Style
page.content:
When people in Cribyn have spare time they do all sorts of things.Mr Redrock likes to do gardening every day.Mr Redrock has a lovely garden fullof green vegetables and pretty flowers. Mr Redrock tries to keep his garden tidy although he is old.
Some people like to read like Mrs Brown of Awel Deg.She likes to read poetry and Miss Marple.She is very lonely so she reads in her spare time.
Some people like to visit their parents or neighbours.
Some go to the swimming pool in Lampeter in their spare time.
My uncle likes to decorate in his spare time.He decorated his house and does a good job too.
